Bruno Aron City University of New York House Plan Association Files
Bruno Aron City University of New York House Plan Association Files
TAM.329
TAM.329
The collection contains bulletins, correspondence, and flyers pertaining to the House Plan and social events it organized. The documents span from 1936 to 1940.

Bruno Aron was the head of the House Plan at the City University of New York. The House Plan was a cocurricular organization which involved CUNY students and staff in an effort to promote community involvement, socialization, and living in small groups in residential colleges.
Donated by Bruno Aron in 2002. The accession number associated with this gift is 2002.021.
